response.overview: Sandra, a 12-year old Mexican American girl living on the Texas/Mexico border, confronts puberty and Catholicism when she is forced to participate in her cousin's quinceannera (a Mexican debutante party with a Catholic mass).
response.tagline: Sandra, a 12-year old Mexican American girl living on the Texas/Mexico border, confronts puberty and Catholicism when she is forced to participate in her cousin's quinceannera (a Mexican debutante party with a Catholic mass).
response.title: Dirty Laundry: A Homemade Telenovela
